attributes.review: Finally an app that works out of the gate & tells me everything I need to know about help #MAGA
attributes.title: MAGA

attributes.review: Convenient, fun, easy to use.  Great idea!! Highly recommend.
attributes.title: Super app!  1-stop info center!!

attributes.review: This app is a TROJAN HORSE that will enable KILLARY and HUSSEIN OBAMA to track patriotic Trump supporters, get all their personal info, and then  round them up and put them in FEMA camps before the election so they can't vote!  DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!
attributes.title: FALSE FLAG!! BEWARE!!!

attributes.review: This is a fun and informative app which gets people more involved with the Trump campaign. Hear the news straight from Mr Trump!  I love it!
attributes.title: Great app!

attributes.review: Very good app. Wish there were more ways I could campaign for Trump. Make America Great Again!
attributes.title: Amazing App

attributes.review: Love the app. Besides keeping up to date with rallies and Crooked Hillary, they made it fun to earn point and play crossword.
attributes.title: Great!!!

attributes.review: The first time I've gotten an political app. I feel a bit more involved.
attributes.title: HUGE!

attributes.review: I've favored Donald J. Trump for president since writing congress and senate to request endorsement for candidacy in July 2015. I believe Donald J. Trump can help me #IBustedSnowdenTwice and have been suppressed.
attributes.title: With Donald J. Trump. For A Better America.

attributes.review: Best app ever. Only suggestion for improvement is to show the campaign schedule of events and link to rally streams. MAGA
attributes.title: Best app ever

attributes.review: Leaderboard makes it interesting for Trump fanatics. Trivia, crossword, and live feed is informative. And, remember to DONATE and VOTE! Communism and New World Order is exactly what this movement is against. #MAGA #TrumpPence16
attributes.title: Great app!
